ygData.subject: Grouping with PVP on non PVP servers
ygData.msgSnippet: Recently, I joined a group with a +pvp player.  I m somewhat superstitious and not very knowledgeable of the pvp assistance rules.  I had this little fear in
ygData.messageBody:
Recently, I joined a group with a +pvp player. I'm somewhat superstitious and not very knowledgeable of the pvp assistance rules. I had this little fear in the back of my head that I'd turn my name red inadvertently. I was surprised to see that at least some of my songs didn't help him... I am positive that Hymn had no effect on him (all the tanks we're full health while he still was shy a bubble). I think Selo's did work though because he (a druid) was able to keep pace with the group (and we all know how slow SoW is </e smiles proudly>). I didn't think to ask if Anthem or any of my other songs worked on him.


My questions are, do any of our songs work on +pvp players?
Is anyone knowledgeable in the ways a -pvp can be turned +pvp from casting or is that just a nasty rumor?


Kassao, Level 19 Half Elf Bard
Mizst, Level 39 Dark Elf Necromancer
Tarew Marr
